revision.comment: Display "This category is about" for Category-namespace pages, per talk request
revision.text: {{Hatnote|<!-- -->{{#if: {{{1|}}}|<!-- -->This {{namespace detect|main=article|category=category|other=page}} is about {{{1}}}.  }}<!-- -->For {{#if:{{{2|}}}|{{{2}}}|other uses}}, see {{#if:{{{3|}}}|[[{{{3}}}]]{{#ifeq:{{{4|}}}|and| and {{#if:{{{5|}}}|[[{{{5}}}]]|[[{{PAGENAME}} (disambiguation)]]}}}}|[[{{PAGENAME}} (disambiguation)]]}}.<!-- -->{{#if:{{{2|}}}|{{#if:{{{4|}}}|<!-- -->{{#ifeq:{{{4|}}}|and||<!-- "and" is a special word, don't outputSupplier "For and, ..." -->  For {{#ifeq:{{{4}}}|1|other uses|{{{4}}}}}, see {{#if:{{{5|}}}|[[{{{5}}}]]{{#ifeq:{{{6|}}}|and| and {{#if:{{{7|}}}|[[{{{7}}}]]|[[{{PAGENAME}} (disambiguation)]]}}}}|[[{{PAGENAME}} (disambiguation)]]}}.}}<!-- -->{{#if:{{{6|}}}|<!-- -->{{#ifeq:{{{6|}}}|and||<!-- -->  For {{#ifeq:{{{6}}}|1|other uses|{{{6}}}}}, see {{#if:{{{7|}}}|[[{{{7}}}]]{{#ifeq:{{{8|}}}|and| and {{#if:{{{9|}}}|[[{{{9}}}]]|[[{{PAGENAME}} (disambiguation)]]}}}}|[[{{PAGENAME}} (disambiguation)]]}}.}}<!-- -->{{#if:{{{8|}}}|<!-- -->{{#ifeq:{{{8|}}}|and||<!-- -->  For {{#ifeq:{{{8}}}|1|other uses|{{{8}}}}}, see {{#if:{{{9|}}}|[[{{{9}}}]]|[[{{PAGENAME}} (disambiguation)]]}}.}}<!-- -->}}<!-- -->}}<!-- -->}}}}}}<!-- -->{{#if:{{{_nocat|}}}||{{#if:{{{1|}}}{{{2|}}}||{{#if:{{{3|}}}|[[Category:Hatnote templates using unusual parameters|A{{PAGENAME}}]]}}}}{{#ifeq:{{str left|{{{1}}}|3}}|is |[[Category:Hatnote templates using unusual parameters|B{{PAGENAME}}]]}}}}<noinclude> {{Documentation}} </noinclude>

revision.comment: Adding "User talk:UBX/+". Userboxes are sometimes demonstrated on the boxes' own talk pages, so "userbox talk space" needs blacklisting too.
revision.text:
'''Actual code of this blacklist:'''
{{if pagename


| Main Page = hide   


| Wikipedia:Cascade-protected items/+ = hide


| User:UBX/+ = hide 
| User talk:UBX/+ = hide 

| Wikipedia:Template messages/* = hide   

| /archiv* = hide   


| page = {{{page|}}}   
}}
{{documentation}}

revision.comment: moved [[Template:Cat handler/numbered]] to [[Template:Category handler/numbered]]: expand name
change wording per talk page – "no links to other articles"
revision.text: <!--{{Dead end}} begin-->{{#ifeq:{{NAMESPACE}}|{{<includeonly>subst:</includeonly>NAMESPACE}}|<includeonly>[[Category:Pages with incorrectly substituted templates|{{PAGENAME}}]]</includeonly>|}}{{Ambox | name = Dead end | class = ambox-dead_end | enumType = style | image = [[File:MUTCD W14-1.svg|50x40px|link=|alt=]] | issue = This {{{1|article}}} '''has no [[Wikipedia:Manual of Style/Linking|links to other Wikipedia articles]]'''. | fix = Please help [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|action=edit}} improve this article] by adding links [[Wikipedia:Only make links that are relevant to the context|that are relevant to the context]] within the existing text. | date = {{{date|}}} | cat = Dead-end pages | all = All dead-end pages | cat2 = Articles covered by WikiProject Wikify | all2 = All articles covered by WikiProject Wikify }}<!--{{Dead end}} end--><noinclude> {{Documentation}} </noinclude>

revision.comment: Mostly undid revision 527708350 by [[Special:Contributions/SilkTork|SilkTork]] ([[User talk:SilkTork|talk]]) - Rv and reapply the one change actually mentioned in the edit summary
revision.text:
<!--{{Dicdef}} begin-->{{#ifeq:{{NAMESPACE}}|{{<includeonly>subst:</includeonly>NAMESPACE}}|<includeonly>[[Category:Pages with incorrectly substituted templates|{{PAGENAME}}]]</includeonly>|}}{{Ambox | name = Dicdef | enumType = move | image = [[File:Edit-copy purple-wikit.svg|50x40px]] | text = This {{{1|article}}} '''appears to be a [[Wikipedia:Wikipedia is not a dictionary|dictionary definition]]'''. Please [[WP:DEVELOP|rewrite it]] to present the subject from an encyclopedic point of view. If it cannot be turned into a full encyclopedia article in the near future, consider moving it to [[Wiktionary]]. {{hidden top|title=Steps for moving to Wiktionary:}} # Check that this {{{1|article}}} meets [[Wiktionary:Wiktionary:Criteria for inclusion|Wiktionary's criteria for inclusion]]. # Check that Wiktionary does not have an article on this word or phrase, as [[wikt:Special:Search/{{PAGENAME}}|verified using the search page]]. If Wiktionary has a definition already, change this tag to {{tl|TWCleanup2}} or else consider a [[Wikipedia:Soft redirect|soft redirect]] to Wiktionary by replacing the text on this page with {{tl|Wi}}. If Wiktionary does not have the definition yet, consider moving the whole {{{1|article}}} to Wiktionary by replacing this tag with the template {{tl|Copy to Wiktionary}}.
<small>This template will no longer automatically categorize articles as candidates to move to Wiktionary.</small> {{hidden bottom}} }}<includeonly>{{#ifeq:{{lc:{{{nocat|false}}}}}|false|[[Category:Flagged dictionary definitions|{{PAGENAME}}]]|<!-- Category suppressed --> }}</includeonly><!--{{Dicdef}} end--><noinclude>{{Documentation}}</noinclude>
#REDIRECT [[Template:Dicdef]]

revision.comment: simplified subst parameter for aesthetics and compatibility with the syntax highlighter gadget
revision.text: <!--{{Notability}} begin-->{{Ambox | name = Notability | subst = <includeonly>{{subst:substcheck}}</includeonly> | enumType = content | class = ambox-Notability | issue = The topic of this article '''may not meet Wikipedia's {{#switch: {{lc:{{{1}}}}} | notability = [[Wikipedia:Notability|general notability guideline]] | astro = [[Wikipedia:Notability (astronomical objects)|notability guideline for astronomical objects]] | notability (people) | bio | biography | biographies = [[Wikipedia:Notability (people)|notability guideline for biographies]] | prof | notability (academics) | academics = [[Wikipedia:Notability (academics)|notability guideline for academics]] | notability (books) | book | books = [[Wikipedia:Notability (books)|notability guideline for books]] | notability (events) | event | events = [[Wikipedia:Notability (events)|notability guideline for events]] | notability (films) | film | movie | movies | films = [[Wikipedia:Notability (films)|notability guideline for films]] | notability (companies and corporations) | institutions | companies | org | organisations | corp | organizations = [[Wikipedia:Notability (organizations and companies)|notability guidelines for companies and organizations]] | products = [[Wikipedia:Notability (organizations and companies)#Products and services|notability guidelines for products and services]] | notability (fiction) | fict | fiction = [[Wikipedia:Notability|general notability guideline]] | list | lists = [[Wikipedia:Notability#Stand-alone lists|notability guideline for stand-alone lists]] | geo | geographic | geography | place | places = [[Wikipedia:Notability (geographic features)|notability guideline for geographic features]] | notability (music) | music = [[Wikipedia:Notability (music)|notability guideline for music]] | avoid neologisms | neologisms = [[Wikipedia:Avoid neologisms|notability guideline for neologisms]] | sport | sports = [[Wikipedia:Notability (sports)|notability guideline for sports and athletics]] | notability (numbers) | numbers = [[Wikipedia:Notability (numbers)|notability guideline for numbers]] | notability (web) | web = [[Wikipedia:Notability (web)|notability guideline for web content]] | #default = [[Wikipedia:Notability|general notability guideline]] }}'''. | fix = Please help to establish notability by adding [[Wikipedia:Identifying reliable sources|reliable, secondary sources]] about the topic. If notability cannot be established, the article is likely to be [[Wikipedia:Merge|merged]], [[Wikipedia:Redirect|redirected]], or [[Wikipedia:Deletion policy|deleted]]. | date = {{{date|}}} | cat = Articles with topics of unclear notability | all = All articles with topics of unclear notability | cat2 = {{#if:{{{cat|}}}|{{{cat}}} articles of unclear notability}} }}<!--{{Notability}} end--><noinclude> {{Documentation}} </noinclude>

revision.comment: copy from sandbox, per request at [[Template talk:Orphan#"Few links" template?]]
revision.text: {{Ambox | name = Orphan | subst = <includeonly>{{subst:</includeonly><includeonly>substcheck}}</includeonly> | enumType = style | class = ambox-Orphan | image = [[File:Wiki letter w.svg|50x40px]] | all = All orphaned articles | sect = {{{1|}}} | issue = {{#if: {{{att|}}} | {{#if:{{{geo|}}}|about a place}} '''is a reviewed [[Wikipedia:Orphan|orphan]], as no other articles [{{fullurl:Special:Whatlinkshere|target={{FULLPAGENAMEE}}&namespace=0}} link to it]'''. | {{#if: {{{incat|}}} | {{#if:{{{geo|}}}|about a place}} '''is a reviewed [[Wikipedia:Orphan|orphan]], as no other articles [{{fullurl:Special:Whatlinkshere|target={{FULLPAGENAMEE}}&namespace=0}} link to it] ''', but is well categorised. | {{#if: {{{few|}}} | {{#if:{{{geo|}}}|about a place}} '''is an [[Wikipedia:Orphan|orphan]], as few other articles [{{fullurl:Special:Whatlinkshere|target={{FULLPAGENAMEE}}&namespace=0}} link to it]''', or is a [[Wikipedia:Walled garden|walled garden]]. | {{#if:{{{geo|}}}|about a place}} '''is an [[Wikipedia:Orphan|orphan]], as no other articles [{{fullurl:Special:Whatlinkshere|target={{FULLPAGENAMEE}}&namespace=0}} link to it]'''. }} }} }} | fix = Please [[Help:Link|introduce links]] to this page from [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special%3ASearch&redirs=1&search={{PAGENAMEU}}&fulltext=Search&ns0=1&title=Special%3ASearch&advanced=1&fulltext={{PAGENAMEU}} related articles]; [http://edwardbetts.com/find_link?q={{FULLPAGENAMEE}} suggestions may be available]. | cat = {{#if: {{{att|}}} | Attempted de-orphan | {{#if: {{{incat|}}} | | {{#if:{{{few|}}} | Low linked articles | Orphaned articles }} }} }} | date = {{#if: {{{att|}}} | {{{att|}}} | {{{date|}}} }} }}<noinclude> <!-- Add categories and interwikis to the /doc subpage, not here! --> {{documentation}} </noinclude>
